description: This file defines a React context-based state management store for the frontend application, managing UI state such as selected categories, search queries, sidebar state, feature flags, and uploaded videos.

methods.name: reducer
methods.description: Reducer function handling state updates based on dispatched actions.

methods.name: StoreProvider
methods.description: Provides the React context for the global store to child components.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Custom hook to access the global store's state and dispatch function.
